stock.burialis:
William Mathewes (sometime sexton of ye parish) was buried in ye Churchyard Aprill ye 1st 1665 Mary Daughter of Henery Hallsey was buried in ye Churchyard Aprill ye 15th 1665. Christopher ye son of Christopher Marsham was buried in ye South Chappell Aprill ye 19th 1665 tfrances Duckett widow was buried in ye Chancell Aprill the 28 1665.
Sarah ye wife of ffowlke Jones was buried in ye Churchyard May ye 2nd 1665. Penelope ye wife of John Nuttall was buried in ye ChurchyardJuly ye 26th 1665. Child bed William son of William Mason was buried in ye ChurchyardAugust ye 8th 1665 — surfeit Ann ye wife of Thomas Hooton was buried in ye ChurchyardAugust ye 12th 1665 — Dropsie.
Abell Coares(Apprentise to Mr Peter Bell was buried in ye ChurchyardAugust ye 17 1665. — Consumption Ann ye wife of ffrancis Mayo was buried in ye South Chappell Aug: ye 31th 1665.— plague Margaret wife of Peter Bell was buried at ye Lower end of ye North Isle September ye 1. 1665— plague Catherine Smith widdow was buried in 3d South Chappell September ye 3d 1665 — plague William ye son of William Baynbrigg was buried in ye Churchyard September ye 5th 1665 — plague. Alexander Chock (Apprentise to Henery Baynbrigg Escp was buried in ye Churchyard September ye 5th 1665 —plague Peter Bell scrivener was buried at ye Lower end of ye North Isle September ye 10th 1665 — plague Amy Thomas a servant maide to Edward Poultney was caried out ye parish and buried in ye new Churchyard September ye 11th 1665 plag Elizabeth Daughter of Martha Williams wid was buried betwixt ye ffonte and Gallerie September ye 12th 1665 plague Ann Vosse Lodger was buried in ye Churchyard September ye the 13th 1665 — plague Christopher English ffreeman was buried in ye Churchyard September ye 13th plag Beniamin Write servant to Hen:Sutton was buried in ye Churchyard September ye 15thplague 1665 Hannah Standbridge was buried in ye Churchyard Septemb ye 17. 1665 Henery Sutton ffre of ye Companie of Joyners was buried in the Churchyard September ye 21th plague 1665 Samuel Browne free of ye Companie of Stationers was buried at ye upper end of ye North Isle September ye 21th 1665 plague Henery son of Hen:Sutton (Lately Deceased) was buried in ye Churchyard September ye 23th plague 1665 Jane wife of Samuel Browne(Lately Deceased) was buried in the North Isle September the 24th plague 1665 William son of Thomas Lowe (deceased) was buried in the Churchyard September ye 24th pla 1665 Robert Mickell free scrivener was buried between ye Gallerie stair and ye ChurchWardens pewe September ye 25; the plaSusanna Killingley servant to Mr Pountney _ buried in the new ground October the first 1665 Pla: Sarah Standbridge daughter to Sarah Standbridge widdow buried in ye Churchyard October ye first 1665. Pla, Sarah Standbridge widdow buried in the Churchyard October the 2nd 1665, PI, Henery Bainbrigg Esquire free of the Company of Cloathworkers buried in the Chauncell close to the great pew October the 2d 1665. PI:
Eleanor the wife of Thomas Austin buried in the Churchyard October the sixth. 1665. Susannathe daughter of Henery Sutton buried in the Churchyard October the eighth 1665 William the son ofDaniel Lingar buried in the Churchyard October the eighth 1665 Joseph the son of Martha Williams widdow buried in the North Isle under the corner pew joyning to ye Font October ye nineth 1665 Josias the son of Martha Williams widd buried in the North Ile under the Corner pew joyning to the front October ye 12th 1665 pi; Docter Raph Harrison Rector of this parish buried in the vault under the Comunion Table October 14th 1665 Plague. Sarah Burton daughter of firancis and Mary Burton buried in the South Ile under the pewes figured 17 and 22, 16° Octob 1665 pi Martha Burton daughter of firancis and Mary Burton buried in the South Ile under the pewes figured 17 and 22 16° Octob 1665 pi Daniell Lingar buried in the Churchyard 21° Octob 1665 pi Elizabeth Lingar was buried in ye Churchyard the 2d of November 1665 Plague Joane Light (servant to Alderm Bainbrigg Deed) was buried in ye Churchyard ye 5th of Novemb 1665 PI: Rebecca Walker wife of Willm Walker was buried in ye north Ile under ye pew figure 12 ye 8° Novemb 1665 Plague Matthew Son of Willm Bate was buried in ye Churchyard the 3d of Decemb 1665 dropsie Clement Egleston Cittizen and Grocer buried in ye North lie under ye pewes figured 20 and 31 5th of Decemb 1665 PI: Lucy Egleston wife Clemt Egleston late deed buried (in ye same grave wth her husband) ye 23° Decemb 1665 PI: Mary Burton Servt Mr Walker was buried in ye new ground ye 23° Decemb 1665 PI.Willm Peyton of London Gente was buried in the North Ile under ye figure 121 ye 28° March 1666 ConsumpLucy filack late wife to Nathll ff: was buried Hoota Stone the midle Ile ye 26° April 1666 Age James Hickes son of James H:Jun was buried in South Ile under ye figure 11. ye 3° Maij 1666 wormes Mary (ye wife of Edward Butterfeild and Sarah his daughter was buried ye midle Isle under ye great midle stone ye 29° May 1666 John Barnett Servt to Sr Phillip ffroude was buried the 24° Junij 1666 in ye new ground, small pox. A Crisome Child of Mr Ste: Toree buried ye 29th of July 1666 in ye new ground Elizabeth ye wife of Ste: Toree was buried ye 10th day of August 1666 in ye new ground Childbed Alice Hawes widdowe was buried ye viij^th day of August 1666 in ye Churchyard dropsy et A Crisome child of ye sd Ste: Torees buried ye 16th of Aug 1666 in the new ground Thomas Bolton was buried in the South Isle on the left hand goeing upp stepps ye xxxI^10th of August 1666
